headline: Trumps endorsement of Hillbilly Elegy writer tested his power in the GOP
author: Melanie MasonStaff Writer

A victory for Vance

The runners-up
Josh Mandel, formerly the states treasurer, and state Sen. Matt Dolan were in second and third place, respectively, with votes still being counted.
